content.prompt:
© Gianni Dagli Orti / The Art Archive at Art Resource, NY

Which features of the Palladian style, seen here in Andrea Palladio’s Villa Rotonda, influenced Thomas Jefferson in his design for Monticello?

choices.label: Four identical facades that provide views in all directions
Figurative sculpture that draws the viewers’ eyes upward
Marble walls that are reminiscent of classical temples from antiquity
Pedimented porticoes that serve as entrances to domestic spaces

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
